attributes.action: Give a posthumous Knighthood to Donald Campbell World water speed record holder 1967
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is sought to attempt to gain the very much deserved and earned posthumous Knighthood for the late great Donald Campbell CBE.
As great fans of Donald Campbell we believe that his great aims and achievements for our country should be recognised.
He was one of the greatest patriots this country has ever seen which we feel should be rewarded with the country's highest award.

rejection.details: Sorry, the PM has now powers to award or recommend posthumous honours
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
